name: Guilmon
effect: [On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 card with [Growlmon] or [Gallantmon] in its name and 1 [Takato Matsuki] among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking][Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has [Growlmon] or [Gallantmon] in its name, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.
